ing: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Puerto Rican rum
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
des:
"I created this drink on Saint Patrick's Day. It is very potent, but the sweetness of the KahluaÂ® cuts the punch of the tequila. However, I still highly recommend that you sip it very slowly. 
I named it 'Dr. Horrible' because mixing those things together was a horrible idea, but it ended up being so very, very good."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add tequila, rum, and coffee-flavored liqueur. Cover shaker, shake, and strain cocktail into a glass.
